info.name: Pixiv 1440p maximized
info.description:
Theme for 1440p+ resolution

Features:
- Fixed Header

- Fixed left column (maintain useful links in screen)

- Fullscreen Discovery (big improvement)

- Bigger avatars, icons, replies, etc
info.additionalInfo:
- Fixed local Feed layout
- Fixed Edit/Resubmit artwork page

Send me a mail to rinine.art@gmail.com if you found a bug or want something added to this style
